meanings.definition: Not conforming to the usual, standard, or accepted language usage
meanings.sent1: Her nonstandard approach to problem-solving often led to creative solutions.
meanings.sent2: The nonstandard design of the building caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The nonstandard spelling of his name made it difficult to find him in the list.
meanings.sent4: His nonstandard way of dressing made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The nonstandard color combination on the car made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Not adhering to the established norms or conventions
meanings.sent1: The nonstandard behavior of the students raised concerns among the teachers.
meanings.sent2: She received criticism for her nonstandard approach to etiquette.
meanings.sent3: The nonstandard seating arrangement at the event caused confusion among the guests.
meanings.sent4: His nonstandard choice of music surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent5: The nonstandard decision to start work early was met with mixed reactions.
